ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 43
ygData.msgSnippet: Sun-dog, First of all, may I ask you to trim your posts. I am not trying to be a a$$ or anything but there are a lot of people that have to pay for internet
ygData.messageBody:
Sun-dog,

First of all, may I ask you to trim your posts. I am not trying to
be a a$$ or anything but there are a lot of people that have to pay for
internet services by the minute, like Europe and Japan and download
their Email. You just had a 23K message that had two lines in it. So
please Delete any un-needed messages when you want to ask a
question or reply to a message. Thanks :) (Please Note the Smiley
Face - No Flame Intended)

Second, I have a SB Live! also and have music in Certain
places but you should check the Options when you log on. Not the
Initial Screen but the main screen when your character is in the
Zone that you are playing in. As soon as you log on you will see the
Windowed Screen with the text box at the bottom. Look up on the
left side of the screen and you should see the Options button. Click
on it and it should give you a box that has Display, Filters, Sounds,
Etc. Click on the Sound and make sure that the music is turned up.
When I installed EQ, mine was turned all the way down and I had
to turn it up to get the music.

Hope this helps and again the 1st point was not a flame but
just a comment.

Mike


At 06:56 AM 5/12/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "sun-dog" <sun-dog@...>
>
>tech question...have an SB Live! sound card...get sounds fine for effects
>etc. but no music ever...is there a known problem with this?
>
>
